issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Logical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are independent of runtime.

fields.summary: constant folding is broken for case-when udf

comments.body:
[~jvaria]: a fix for this exists in a patch I'm currently reviewing - HIVE-10327

We can backport that part immediately to 1.2.0.
Fix for this is contained in patch of HIVE-10636
[~ashutoshc]/[~t3rmin4t0r] are you planning to commit either HIVE-10636/HIVE-10327 to 1.2 branch?
yeah.. I will do this shortly.
This issue has been fixed and released as part of the 1.2.0 release. If you find an issue which seems to be related to this one, please create a new jira and link this one with new jira.
